TopicTitle: Stop the Panther from yawing during roll maneuver?

Articles.Content:
I have a single engine design which has a slightly below center CoM. For some reason, this gives cause for the panther to full yaw when trying to roll, which in turn makes it actually very difficult to roll at all.

Short of making sure the CoM is directly in line with the CoT, is there any way I can get it to not do this? Other than turning off gimbal completely, that is.

Unlike control,s, you cant disable yaw/pitch/roll on engines. SO yeah, make sure its centered or thats gonna happen (thsi was to some extent an issue in the past too, but only this update do we get such insane vector range engines that its really noticeable in practice.
Maybe when Tweakable Everything is updated, you could try using that to trim what gimbals what.
